title: The Shaft  | 14
description:
This is the last of the first batch of messages. Noah and Sara find themselves being hunted, and have to find a way to elude their would-be captors and get their messages out.
CAST
Narrator – Mike Howorun
Noah – Brady Roberts
Sara – Greta Carew-Johns
Palmer - Kamy Bruder
Soldier 1 - Jarryd Baine
Soldier 2 - Matthew Hall
Chupacabra Warlord - Kevin Doree
Editing and Sound Design – Matthew Hall & Mike Howorun
Post Production Producer - Rob Johnston
Written/Directed – Mike Howorun
Produced by - Matthew Hall, Brady Roberts, Mike Howorun, Dila Velazquez
Created by Mike Howorun & Brady Roberts
Contact: escapingdenverpod@gmail.com 
Instagram: @escapingdenver
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

This is the last of the first batch of messages. Noah and Sara find themselves being hunted, and have to find a way to elude their would-be captors and get their messages out.
